title: Supervisory conferences
creator_credit: Art Babbitt, Edward L. Gershman, McGraw-Hill Text-Films and Academy Productions
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personnel Management”
Dramatised incidents in an industrial plant are used to show how conferences on the supervisory level lead to effective handling, training and utilisation of employees.
creator_credit_for_label: Art Babbitt, Edward L. Gershman, McGraw-Hill Text-Films and Academy Productions
